items.title: Great job! #1
items.description:
I like this project! It is similar to a11y.css but ANDI seems to have better navigation. Likely because ANDI is javascript and a11y is only css.
That being said, I think the 'installation' instructions could be simplified to just start with, copy/paste the snippet. This should work in any browser.
It would be nice if the snippet was in the github readme as well.

items.title: Outdated code job link #3531
items.description:
This code comment links to https://www.consumerfinance.gov/jobs/technology-innovation-fellows/, which contains outdated job links and info about fellows who are no longer with the bureau.
Expected behavior
https://www.consumerfinance.gov/jobs/technology-innovation-fellows/ is worded to reflect the current workforce and opportunities at the bureau.

items.title: Remove deference to field cardinality
items.description: Currently, if a field is single-value only, then the view pane arg cannot allow multiple selections. But, that may actually be a use case. So, we should just remove that deference to the field cardinality.

items.title: 4 - New feature for a thing
items.description: Would be nice if a user could do a thing using this new feature.  Its a nice to have and would make the overall experience better.

items.title: 5 - Decrease load time
items.description: The application takes too long to load.  Need helping optimizing page so it loads faster.

items.title: 6 - Search not filtering correctly
items.description: When a user searches a term with a filter, the filter is not being taken into account.
